note.p: Death: 29 Devonshire Street, Queen Square, Bloomsbury (29 August 1854)
Burial: The burial-ground of St George the Martyr, Hunter Street, Brunswick Square
Career: Watchmaker; took up painting and exhibited at the Royal Academy; patented several inventions
References: Lise Wilkinson, 'William Brockedon, FRS (1787-1854)' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 65-72, plate
Lise Wilkinson, 'Three Drawings of Fellows by William Brockedon, FRS' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 183-187
